name: TikTok Profile Information
filters: Maximum number of profiles per tag
Only collect profile with contact email
special_instructions: This tool is limited to 30 results per run. To get more results, an upgrade is required.
The tool requires a list of hashtags from which to scrape profiles.
The tool allows filtering by minimum and maximum follower count.
The tool can be set to only collect profiles that have a contact email.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
